slides.title: Welcome to the ICA
slides.text: The ionic conference app is a practical preview of the ionic framework in action, and a demonstration of proper code use.

slides.title: What is Ionic?
slides.text: Ionic Pro is a powerful set of services and features built on top of Ionic Framework that brings a totally new level of app development agility to mobile dev teams.

slides.title: What is Ionic Pro?
